conversations.english: Hello!Aunty.嘿，姑妈。
conversations.chinese: 嘿，姑妈。
conversations.reply_english: Hello!Happy Birthday.I've never thought he is so tall.嘿！生日快乐。我没想到他已经这么高了。
conversations.reply_chinese: 嘿！生日快乐。我没想到他已经这么高了。

conversations.english: Susan, good evening. Why are you so dressed up?苏珊，晚上好。你怎么打扮成这样？
conversations.chinese: 苏珊，晚上好。你怎么打扮成这样？
conversations.reply_english: I am on my way out to a New Year’s banquet. How do I look? Is my make-up OK?我要去参加一个新年宴会。我看上去怎么样？我的妆可以吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 我要去参加一个新年宴会。我看上去怎么样？我的妆可以吗？

conversations.english: Why are you walking to and fro in the room?为什么一直在房间里走来走去的？
conversations.chinese: 为什么一直在房间里走来走去的？
conversations.reply_english: I’m worrying about the children. After all this is the first time they have been out without us.我为孩子们担心。毕竟他们是第一次离开我们，走出家门。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我为孩子们担心。毕竟他们是第一次离开我们，走出家门。

conversations.english: Now darling, I know that we've bought this house together, but it's just going to be far too expensive to decorate it. I think we should sell it.现在，亲爱的。我知道我们一起买了这套房子，但是装修太贵了。我觉得我们应该卖了它。
conversations.chinese: 现在，亲爱的。我知道我们一起买了这套房子，但是装修太贵了。我觉得我们应该卖了它。
conversations.reply_english: Oh, no, Nathan, I...I really think we've bought this flat at the right time, you know. Market prices are going to go up, and I think you'll find in a year or two it will be worth a lot more.噢，不，内森，我…我真的认为我们买这套房子买得是时候，你知道的。市场价正在上涨，我想你会在一至两年内发现它会增值很多。
conversations.reply_chinese: 噢，不，内森，我…我真的认为我们买这套房子买得是时候，你知道的。市场价正在上涨，我想你会在一至两年内发现它会增值很多。

conversations.english: Grandpa, this seat is for you, for you are the eldest person here and also it's your birthday today.爷爷，这个位置是给您的，因为您是这里的长辈而且今天是您的生日。
conversations.chinese: 爷爷，这个位置是给您的，因为您是这里的长辈而且今天是您的生日。
conversations.reply_english: Oh, you are such a good child today. Come here. Sit next to me.哦，你今天可真是个乖孩子啊。过来这里，坐我旁边吧。
conversations.reply_chinese: 哦，你今天可真是个乖孩子啊。过来这里，坐我旁边吧。

conversations.english: Hi, Natasha, how's life?嗨，娜塔莎，最近怎么样？
conversations.chinese: 嗨，娜塔莎，最近怎么样？
conversations.reply_english: Great. My family came to visit me.挺好的，我家里人来了。
conversations.reply_chinese: 挺好的，我家里人来了。

title: 我有些想家了A little homesick

conversations.english: Tom! How are you? We missed you at the party last night. Are you OK?汤姆，你怎么了。昨晚聚会我们都很想你，你还好吗？
conversations.chinese: 汤姆，你怎么了。昨晚聚会我们都很想你，你还好吗？
conversations.reply_english: I don’t know.I didn’t really feel like going out.I guess I’m feeling a little homesick.我不知道。我不想出去。我想我是有点想家了。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我不知道。我不想出去。我想我是有点想家了。

conversations.english: How many people are there in your family?你们家有多少人？
conversations.chinese: 你们家有多少人？
conversations.reply_english: Five. Besides my parents and me, there are my brother and sister.5个人。除了我和我父母之外，还有我哥哥和妹妹。
conversations.reply_chinese: 5个人。除了我和我父母之外，还有我哥哥和妹妹。

conversations.english: Does your family have a record of your ancestors?你们家有家谱吗？
conversations.chinese: 你们家有家谱吗？
conversations.reply_english: Sure. My mom has been working on our family tree for years. She’s always updating it.当然有了。我妈妈这些年来一直在整理家谱，而且保持更新。
conversations.reply_chinese: 当然有了。我妈妈这些年来一直在整理家谱，而且保持更新。

conversations.english: What's your opinion about childless couples? Will you choose to have no kids?你是怎么看待那些不要孩子的夫妻的？你打算要不要孩子。
conversations.chinese: 你是怎么看待那些不要孩子的夫妻的？你打算要不要孩子。
conversations.reply_english: To be honest, I wouldn't.说实在的，我不打算要孩子。
conversations.reply_chinese: 说实在的，我不打算要孩子。

conversations.english: What does your father do?你父亲是做什么的?
conversations.chinese: 你父亲是做什么的?
conversations.reply_english: He is a worker．他是名工人。
conversations.reply_chinese: 他是名工人。

conversations.english: You are married to a foreigner, huh? So what’s it like?你跟一个老外结婚了，是吗？那么是个什么样？
conversations.chinese: 你跟一个老外结婚了，是吗？那么是个什么样？
conversations.reply_english: Well, the first year of our marriage, we had great difficulty getting along. The things that are important to me are not important to him. We had a lot of conflicts.嗯，我们结婚的第一年，我们很难相处。对我来说重要的事对他来说又不重要。我们有过很多冲突。
conversations.reply_chinese: 嗯，我们结婚的第一年，我们很难相处。对我来说重要的事对他来说又不重要。我们有过很多冲突。

title: 我后悔这么早有个小孩

conversations.english: Do you have much experience with kids?你对小孩有经验吗？
conversations.chinese: 你对小孩有经验吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes. I have three sons. Actually I also have a grandson.有。我有三个儿子。实际上我还有一个孙子。
conversations.reply_chinese: 有。我有三个儿子。实际上我还有一个孙子。

title: 我爸爸每天都练习举重

conversations.english: I saw an interesting program on TV last night. It was about elderly people.昨晚我在电视上看了一个很有趣的节目。是关于老年人。
conversations.chinese: 昨晚我在电视上看了一个很有趣的节目。是关于老年人。
conversations.reply_english: And what did the program say?那么节目上都说了些什么？
conversations.reply_chinese: 那么节目上都说了些什么？

conversations.english: So Chris, I've heard that you're from a big family. How many people?克里斯，我听说你来自一个大家庭。有多少人？
conversations.chinese: 克里斯，我听说你来自一个大家庭。有多少人？
conversations.reply_english: Nine total. Seven children and my parents.一共9人。7个孩子和我父母。
conversations.reply_chinese: 一共9人。7个孩子和我父母。

title: 毕业后要学会独立生活

conversations.english: So, Fred, what are your plans for after graduation?那么，弗莱德，毕业后你有什么打算？
conversations.chinese: 那么，弗莱德，毕业后你有什么打算？
conversations.reply_english: Well, I’ve already got a job waiting for me back in my hometown.嗯，我家乡已经有份工作正等着我回去做。
conversations.reply_chinese: 嗯，我家乡已经有份工作正等着我回去做。

conversations.english: How many people are there in your family?你们家有几口人?
conversations.chinese: 你们家有几口人?
conversations.reply_english: Five.My father，mother，brother，sister-in-law and me．五口。我父母，我兄弟，他妻子和我。
conversations.reply_chinese: 五口。我父母，我兄弟，他妻子和我。

title: 全家福Is this a photo of your family

conversations.english: Is this a photo of your family?这是你的全家福吗？
conversations.chinese: 这是你的全家福吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes,it is.It was taken just before I was leaving for college.是啊，这是我来上大学拍的。
conversations.reply_chinese: 是啊，这是我来上大学拍的。

conversations.english: What does your mother do,may I ask?你妈妈是做什么工作的？
conversations.chinese: 你妈妈是做什么工作的？
conversations.reply_english: My mother works in a company as an accountant.她是一家公司的会计。
conversations.reply_chinese: 她是一家公司的会计。

title: 她是我奶奶She is my grandma

conversations.english: Who's that old lady trimming the trees?修剪树枝的那位老人是谁呀？
conversations.chinese: 修剪树枝的那位老人是谁呀？
conversations.reply_english: She's my grandma.是我奶奶。
conversations.reply_chinese: 是我奶奶。

conversations.english: This is my uncle,Charles.这是我叔叔，查尔斯。
conversations.chinese: 这是我叔叔，查尔斯。
conversations.reply_english: He looks strong.What does he do?他看上去很结实，做什么工作的？
conversations.reply_chinese: 他看上去很结实，做什么工作的？

conversations.english: They must be your parents,what do they do?他们准是你父母了，他们都做什么工作？
conversations.chinese: 他们准是你父母了，他们都做什么工作？
conversations.reply_english: My mother is a professor and my father is a manager.我母亲是个教授，我父亲是个经理。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我母亲是个教授，我父亲是个经理。

conversations.english: What shall I call him?我该叫他什么？
conversations.chinese: 我该叫他什么？
conversations.reply_english: Oh,you may call him Uncle,or Henry.你可以叫他叔叔，或叫他亨利。
conversations.reply_chinese: 你可以叫他叔叔，或叫他亨利。

conversations.english: Your father looks much younger in the picture.照片中你爸爸可真年轻。
conversations.chinese: 照片中你爸爸可真年轻。
conversations.reply_english: He was 20 years old then.那时他才二十岁。
conversations.reply_chinese: 那时他才二十岁。

title: 你姐夫很有个性A man of character

conversations.english: Is this your brother-in-law?这是你姐夫吗？
conversations.chinese: 这是你姐夫吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes,he married my sister ten years ago.对，十年前他和我姐姐结婚。
conversations.reply_chinese: 对，十年前他和我姐姐结婚。

title: 风的征兆The sign of wind

conversations.english: The sun is shining.阳光灿烂。
conversations.chinese: 阳光灿烂。
conversations.reply_english: But there're some mare's tails.但是有些马尾云。
conversations.reply_chinese: 但是有些马尾云。

conversations.english: I heard many stories about your brother.我听说过很多你哥哥的故事。
conversations.chinese: 我听说过很多你哥哥的故事。
conversations.reply_english: He's a hero in our town.他是我们镇的英雄。
conversations.reply_chinese: 他是我们镇的英雄。

conversations.english: What a brilliant smile!他笑得可真美！
conversations.chinese: 他笑得可真美！
conversations.reply_english: That's my cousin Hubert.He likes smiling.那是我表哥休伯特，他很爱笑。
conversations.reply_chinese: 那是我表哥休伯特，他很爱笑。

conversations.english: Welcome! Welcome to Little Italy. We're the most Italian family here!欢迎光临！欢迎来到小意大利。我们是这里最典型的意大利家庭！
conversations.chinese: 欢迎光临！欢迎来到小意大利。我们是这里最典型的意大利家庭！
conversations.reply_english: So I've heard. That's why I'm having such a great time.我听说了。所以我才玩得如此尽兴.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我听说了。所以我才玩得如此尽兴.

conversations.english: Thank you so much. I can't take this.谢谢。我不能收下.
conversations.chinese: 谢谢。我不能收下.
conversations.reply_english: She will insist. It's a rosary. She has millions of them. Take it.她会坚持要你收下。这是念珠。这东西她多得是。收下吧。
conversations.reply_chinese: 她会坚持要你收下。这是念珠。这东西她多得是。收下吧。

title: 你丈夫能帮上很多忙吗

conversations.english: Your husband is very helpful, isn't he?你的丈夫能帮上你很多忙，不是吗？
conversations.chinese: 你的丈夫能帮上你很多忙，不是吗？
conversations.reply_english: Willing to help, maybe, but not as helpful as you think.也许他挺愿意帮忙的，可是不像你想像中的那样能帮上忙。
conversations.reply_chinese: 也许他挺愿意帮忙的，可是不像你想像中的那样能帮上忙。

conversations.english: This man is your fiance,Dolly?多丽，这人是你未婚夫吗？
conversations.chinese: 多丽，这人是你未婚夫吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yeah,how do you like him?对，你看他怎么样？
conversations.reply_chinese: 对，你看他怎么样？

conversations.english: Well, I can’t believe your uncle and aunt came to stay with us for a week, and they did not even call us in advance.嗯，我真不敢相信你的叔叔和姑妈和我们住了一个星期，甚至他们都没有提前打个招呼。
conversations.chinese: 嗯，我真不敢相信你的叔叔和姑妈和我们住了一个星期，甚至他们都没有提前打个招呼。
conversations.reply_english: John, they are old-fashioned people from the Chinese countryside. That’s their custom.约翰，他们是从中国农村来的老年人。那是他们的习俗。
conversations.reply_chinese: 约翰，他们是从中国农村来的老年人。那是他们的习俗。

title: 我喜欢自立 I like to be independent

conversations.english: Mom, you know that Andrea and I sometimes worry about you.妈妈，你知道吗，安德里亚和我有时很担心你。
conversations.chinese: 妈妈，你知道吗，安德里亚和我有时很担心你。
conversations.reply_english: Really? Why would you worry about me? I’m just fine.真的吗？你们为什么会担心我？我都很好。
conversations.reply_chinese: 真的吗？你们为什么会担心我？我都很好。

conversations.english: Alice, your father is amazing. He’s 90 years old and he lives alone in that big house.艾丽斯，你的爸爸可真行! 他九十岁了，还一个人住那么大的房子。
conversations.chinese: 艾丽斯，你的爸爸可真行! 他九十岁了，还一个人住那么大的房子。
conversations.reply_english: I know. He doesn’t like to ask anyone for help. My dad insists on paying his own bills and taking care of himself!我知道，他不喜欢求助任何人。我爸爸坚持自己支付帐单，自己照顾自己！
conversations.reply_chinese: 我知道，他不喜欢求助任何人。我爸爸坚持自己支付帐单，自己照顾自己！

conversations.english: Thanks for offering to give me a lift. I'm looking forward to this party, but I didn't want to go alone.谢谢你的好意送我一程。我盼着参加这个晚会，但是我不想一个人去。
conversations.chinese: 谢谢你的好意送我一程。我盼着参加这个晚会，但是我不想一个人去。
conversations.reply_english: Don't mention it. It's my pleasure. Have you been to one of these large, sit-down dinner parties since you got to New Haven?不用谢。是我的荣幸。自从你来纽黑文市，你有没有去过这种大型的、坐下来吃饭的聚会？
conversations.reply_chinese: 不用谢。是我的荣幸。自从你来纽黑文市，你有没有去过这种大型的、坐下来吃饭的聚会？
